logic.users

Class CarManufacturingCompany

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.users.CarManufacturingCompany

  • public class CarManufacturingCompany
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to describe a car manufacturing company.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CarManufacturingCompany()
      Makes a new car manufacturing company.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CarManufacturingCompany

        public CarManufacturingCompany()

    • Method Detail

      • logIn

        public User logIn(java.lang.String userName)
        Checks if the given user name is valid and returns the corresponding user. If the given user name is valid and the user does not exist yet, the user is added to the HashMap of users. If the given user name is not valid, this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name used to login.
        Returns:
        Returns the user corresponding to the given user name otherwise if: - the HashMap of users contains the given user name as a key, - the list of valid manager names contains the given user name, - the list of valid garage holders names contains the given user name or - the list of valid mechanic names contains the given user name. - the list of valid customs shop manager names contains the given user name. Returns null otherwise.

      • addOrder

        public void addOrder(Order order)
        Adds the given order to the assembly line if the given order is not null.
        Parameters:
        order - The order which needs to be added to the assembly line.

      • getWorkStations

        public java.util.List<Workstation> getWorkStations()
        Method to return the list of workstations of the assembly line of this car manufacturing company.
        Returns:
        The workstations of the assembly line.

      • moveAssemblyLine

        public boolean moveAssemblyLine(int shiftDuration)
        Moves the assembly line forward if every work station is ready and sets the end time of the first order to the given end time.
        Returns:
        True if the assembly line has been moved. False if the assembly line can not be moved.

      • getCurrentTime

        public org.joda.time.DateTime getCurrentTime()

      • changeStrategy

        public void changeStrategy(Order order)
        Changes the strategy according to the given order.
        Parameters:
        order - The order that has to be used as a template for the strategy.

      • doTask

        public boolean doTask(Task task)
        Completes the task corresponding to the given task.
        Parameters:
        task - A copy of the task that needs to be completed.
        Returns:
        True if the task is completed successfully False the task could not be completed.

      • getRequiredTasks

        public java.util.List<Task> getRequiredTasks(Workstation station)
        Returns a list of pending tasks at a given workstation.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A list of tasks that are pending at the given workstation.

      • checkPhaseDuration

        public boolean checkPhaseDuration(int duration)
        Asks the assembly line to check the given duration, if the duration is allowed it returns true, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration that needs to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the duration is allowed. False otherwise
